name: Nightmare Rally
overview: Nightmare Rally is a driving game simulating a pseudo 3D environment for a car. The player is a rally driver and must drive through stages as soon as possible, avoid bumping into objects such as trees, rocks, rivers etc. The right route is signaled through red and blue flags. The player must pay attention to the level of damage, high engine temperature and fuel. When destroyed the car is lost and the player has several cars (lives) to use.
